Alistar.name: AlistarБ
Alistar.title: Бthe MinotaurБ
Alistar.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзAs the mightiest warrior to ever emerge from the Minotaur tribes of the Great Barrier, Alistar defended his tribe from Valoran's many dangers; that is, until the coming of the Noxian army. Alistar was lured from his village by the machinations of Keiran Darkwill, General Boram Darkwill's youngest son and commander of the Noxian expeditionary force. When Alistar returned, he found his village burning and his family slain. Bellowing with rage, he charged an entire regiment of Noxus' elite, slaughtering them by the hundreds. Only the intervention of some of Noxus' most skilled summoners checked Alistar's rage. Brought in chains to Noxus, Alistar spent the intervening years as a gladiator in the Fleshing, pitted in endless battle for the entertainment of Noxus' wealthy leaders.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцAlistar's once noble soul slowly became twisted, and he would have been driven to insanity if not for Ayelia, a young servant girl who befriended him and eventually arranged for his escape. Suddenly free, Alistar joined the newly formed League of Legends to fight as a champion, hoping to one day exact his final vengeance upon Noxus and find the girl who had renewed his hope. Initially unwilling to cater to his celebrity status as a champion, Alistar has since discovered that there is power in fame, and he has become a vocal advocate for those whom the Noxian government treads upon. He also calls to light things that the Noxian military would prefer remain hidden -- something that has made him very unpopular with Noxus' nobles. His charitable work has earned him several philanthropic awards, which serve as an interesting contrast to the rage and destruction he brings to the League of Legends.ЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзIf you intend to grab the bull by the horns as a summoner, Alistar might have something to say about that.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
Alistar.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзAs the mightiest warrior to ever emerge from the Minotaur tribes of the Great Barrier, Alistar defended his tribe from Valoran's many dangers; that is, until the coming of ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжUsing Pulverize can allow you to establish better positioning for Headbutt.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжMovement speed is very important on Alistar. Consider which boots to buy carefully.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиUsing Flash can allow you catch your target off guard to knock them back into your allies with Pulverize and Headbutt.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжAlistar is very distruptive but very tough - try to target more fragile damage dealers.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдWatch out for the Pulverize-Headbutt combo when around turrets.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиWhen Alistar uses his ultimate, it's often better to move back and wait until the effect wears off before attacking him.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БPulverizeБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙAlistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.  On landing, enemies are stunned.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгAlistar smashes the ground, dealing ГбБ{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗз magic damage and tossing all nearby enemy units into the air, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.ЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбTriumphant RoarБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлAlistar lets out a commanding war cry, restoring health to himself and nearby friendly units for half the amount.  Can be cast more often if nearby enemies are dying.ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БRestores Б{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖж health to Alistar and half as much to nearby allies. Cooldown is reduced by жЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }}БбГг seconds each time a nearby enemy unit dies.ДгГбБ

spells.name: БбUnbreakable WillБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлAlistar lets out a wild roar, gaining bonus damage, removing all crowd-control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДRemoves disables from Alistar, and Alistar gains ДгГбБ{{ e3 }}Бб Attack Damage and takes ГбБ{{ e4 }}БбГг% reduced physical and magic damage for гГбБ{{ e1 }}Б seconds.Б

passive.name: TrampleБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиEach time Alistar casts a spell, he Tramples nearby units and turrets for a few seconds, dealing damage to units he walks over.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
